sentence: a boy is getting a cookie out_of a cookie jar in a high shelf in a very precarious position on a stool .
the mother is washing dishes and not paying attention to what she's doing .
there's a nice peaceful sign outside .
fortunately there's nothing happening out there .
there's dishes on the counter in the sink .
well except that there's a boy and a girl and the mother .
